column1: '''TEK''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "sign; make a written mark". The root is related to [[TEÑ]].<ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}
In the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' appears the root TEK- ("make a mark
In the ''Qenya Lexicon'' appears the root TEKE ("make marks").<ref>{{PE|12}}</ref><ref name=PE17/>
